name: Airport Time Machine
description:
You are an air traffic controller in the year 1925. As time progresses, your small grass airfield grows up into a major international airport in 1970. Witness WW2, the flying mail service in the 1920's, the breaking of the sound barrier, and birth of the passenger jet.

60 different levels;
40 different aircraft types;
3 different eras, including future, plus an '1802 steampunk' era.

The PC/Mac version of this game retails for $15. The price is reduced to build our App Store rating. GRAB THIS GAME NOW!!
